name: billyamericana

name: centipede_damascus
text: A comment left by centipede_damascus was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by madnes, Thorfinn, mortshire, nutmeg)

name: spinynorman
text:
My boorish New York friend once said of some metrosexual gentleman, "Lookit them damn nancies, all wearin' shiny shirts and probably orderin' Cum and Kahlua..."

After recovering from his crassness, Cum and Kahlua became a regular term in my lexicon for a questionable drink.

name: woodenteeth
text: "all wearin' shiny shirts..." your boorish friend reads Achewood! OR... Onstad reads the Boorish New Yorker.

name: spinynorman
text: This dialect bleeds into both your conversations and your quotations from memory, I guess. : (

name: saucy_jack
text: No you know I have to say that is not an Achewood-specific way of making sentences.

name: choosebro
text: That type of speak is not an Onstad exclusive. I know plenty of old men around here that say such things. And around here "around here" means Queensland Australia and there exists a large amount of water between here and California.

name: gormster
text: There is a similarity between SoCal and Queensland, and that is that there are lots of stupid people there. The difference? In Queensland it is mainly the tourists. "LET'S GO TO THE GOLD COAST FOR SCHOOLIES YEAH THAT WILL BE FUN BECAUSE THERE WON'T BE A HUNDRED THOUSAND TOOLS THERE"
